# weight

**Instance Property**

A normalized percentage that designates how much effect this node has relative to peer nodes.

## Declaration

```swift
var weight: BlendWeight { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property relates to the node’s peers in a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeBlendNode/sources] array. The sum of all node weights in a given [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeBlendNode/sources] array needs to equal `1.0`.

## Configuring the blend tree node

- **name**: A textual name for the blend node.
